description: Shower niche sill tip…I applied mortar inside the niche then back notch troweled the tile. This allowed me to pitch the tile yet make it level left to right. I also used a toothbrush (not my personal one, ha) to clean the miter joint. Our Gold and Platinum members have access to this full tutorial series inside our Video Library at homerepairtutor.com 🔥#tile #bathroomremodel #homerenovation
title: Shower Niche Sill Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
